EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference {!Case.CaseNumber}
Update for {!Case.Type} - {!Case.CaseNumber}
Need help or have an enquiry?
Please visit Help & Support to:
contact our support team directly find answers to many commonly asked questions
If your enquiry is urgent, please call us on 1800 817 538 to speak to our Customer Care Team.
Regards,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
